subject: classpath problem
msgSnippet: Hi, I use Junit to test my application that is developed in Netbeans . In my test method i create an bean object. But there is an error. The system cannot find
messageBody:
Hi,
I use Junit to test my application that is developed
in Netbeans . In my test method
i create an bean object. But there is an error.

The system cannot find the file specified) Nested
exception:
E:\Bussiness\Projects\hasanpasa\hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd
(The system cannot find the file specified)
at
org.dom4j.io.SAXReader.read(SAXReader.java:484)

I think my problem is with classpath. It coldn't find
hibernate-mapping-3.0.dtd or anything else maybe. How
can i set my classpath to directory which involves the
fileþt cant find

Thanks in advance
